text: A khto ne maye raba, to nekhay trymaye bezperervnyy pist protyahom dvokh misyatsiv, pered tym, yak torknutysya [druzhyny]. Khto zh ne mozhe zrobyty ts πoho, to nekhay nahoduye shistdesyat bidnyakiv. Use tse dlya toho, shchob uviruvaly vy v Allaha ta Yoho Poslantsya. Takymy ye obmezhennya Allaha, a na neviruyuchykh chekaye bolisna kara
